metadata.title: UCLA Phonology Archive Fulani text corpus
notes: The files in the subdirectories below were scraped semi-automatically from the UCLA Phonetics Archive,
Because table headers are not consistent across languages, header mappings for each language are maintained in a file called `headers.json`.
the parser is parse-ucla-xml.js, and can be run with deno (https://deno.land/) and the command $ deno task download [your language code here]
If the script is re-run on another system, it will download all the .wav files in the appropriate directory.
